name: Circus of Misrule
description:
Welcome to the show! The enigmatic Lord of Misrule is looking forward to seeing your performance! Build a team of funny monsters, fight through waves of circus freaks and see how long you can survive...

Featuring...

  • Over 35 vermin, designed by the lovely folks at Vermin Fight Club
  • 7 tribes that grant synergistic effects
  • 20 waves of spooky minions
  • 4? heroes with customizable abilities
